channel.title: Help me with a npc spawn then unspawn please!
channel.description:
Well basically I am adding a mini game and when you get the reward I want a man to pop up and give you something then ZIP away he goes. I have some code i know works that I can supply.
I started it with a void. [code]public void miniReward(){[/code]
Then I added the NPC spawner. [code]server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2262, absX+1, absY+1, heightLevel);[/code]
Now I just need to know how to use the [code]actionInterval[/code] thing, and how to make him disappear!
Help is appreciated.
~Val

item.title: Help me with a npc spawn then unspawn please!
